div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 674 Coada Malului, c. 23 km. N of Ploiesti, Rumania, 1936 or 1941 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Mitrea) Contents: AR. With AR jewelry Thasos: many spread-flan tetradr. Cotys of Thrace: 1 tetradr. (as Head, HN2, p. 285) Disposition: Bucharest (Acad.) 1 (Cotys) † Moisil, Balcania 1944, p. 15, no. 18 Popescu, Studi si referate privind istoria României, pp. 91-104
